c74object.name: abc.hoa.mirror~
c74object.description: abc.hoa.mirror~ is an High Order Ambisonics (HOA) mirror process. This objects apply mirror L/R symmetry to a set of ambisonic spatial components using a simple multiplication of negative components by a 'factor'. This 'factor' parameter can take three different values: 1 (original sound field), 0 (original and mirror sound field together) and -1 (only the mirror sound field).

objarg.name: ambisonic-order
objarg.digest: the ambisonic order of the decorrelation process
objarg.description: first argument is the ambisonic order [init=1, min=1, max=7, step=1].

attribute.name: factor
attribute.description:
sets the factor of mirror sound field [init=1:min=-1:max=1:step=1].
If 1, original sound field
If -1, original + mirror sound field
If 0, mirror sound field
attribute.digest: sets the factor of mirror sound field

method.name: factor
method.description:
sets the factor of mirror sound field [init=1:min=-1:max=1:step=1].
If 1, original sound field
If -1, original + mirror sound field
If 0, mirror sound field
method.digest: sets the factor of mirror sound field
